Posts.Content: mooner123 wrote: I am trying not to be worried about a painful lump in my left breast. The lump (or lumps) have been there for at least 4 years. My breasts are lumpy so its hard to tell exactly which one hurts. My whole breast hurts when I touch it and gets worse around my cycle. It also hurts to some degree everyday. I'm 37 and have never had a mammogram. I was told a few years ago that painful lumps were rarely breast cancer. Now, I've been hearing otherwise and feel that 4 years is way too long to not have this checked out. How concerned should I be over this?   Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I have a painful lump... mooner123 mooner123

Posts.Content: Oct 25, 2010 07:44PM mooner123 wrote: THANK YOU, LADIES!!!!!
